pages.title: Tinkers Complement
pages.text: Tinkers Complement is designed to add features to Tinkers Construct in a modular way, providing mod compatibility and features to help with modpacks.

pages.title: Features
pages.text: - Melter and Bucket Cast$(br2)- Alloy Tank$(br2)- Porcelain Casting$(br2)- High Oven$(br2)Refer to your 'Materials and you' book to find out how these features work.
